quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Elizabeth Montgomery
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, mini-series. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Did Brad Pitt star in the movie Lara Croft: Tomb Raider?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: In the mini-series The Awakening Land Elizabeth Montgomery co-starred with which of these actors?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All of these

questions.question: Brad Pitt voiced one of the characters in the computer-animated film Shark Tale.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: The leading role in the show Bewitched was specially written for Elizabeth Montgomery.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Did Brad Pitt  marry Angelina Jolie in 2005?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: What is the color of Brad Pitts eyes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: blue

questions.question: Brad Pitt started an affair with Angelina Jolie during the filming of what movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr.  Mrs. Smith

questions.question: What was the first movie in which Brad Pitt appeared?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No Mans Land

questions.question: What was the first TV movie in which Elizabeth Mongomery starred, after the end of the TV show Bewitched?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Victim

questions.question: Elizabeth Montgomery won four Emmy Awards for her portrayal of Samantha Stephens on Bewitched.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Actor Brad Pitt has had his ears pierced.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Elizabeth Montgomery, the star of Bewitched, was married in real life to which person involved with the show?

options.text: The Network Executive in charge of the show
The Male Star of the show

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Director/Producer of the show

questions.question: The show Bewitched, starring Elizabeth Montgomery, ran for how many seasons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 8

questions.question: What actress co-stars with Brad Pitt in the romantic comedy The Mexican?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Julia Roberts

questions.question: In the movie Sins of the Mother, Elizabeth Montgomery played the mother of a sick, sadistic, criminal man. On what book was this movie based?

options.text: Son. A Psychopath And His Victims

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Son. A Psychopath And His Victims

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

options.text: They attended the same prep school in the suburbs of Washington, DC.
They were fraternity brothers in college.
Each of them works as a TV/film director or producer.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Each of them works as a TV/film director or producer.

questions.question: How is the movie Casablanca linked to the end of the Curse of the Bambino and the Boston Red Sox World Series victory in 2004?

options.text: Much of  Casablanca was originally shot in Florida, spring home of  the Red Sox.
The brothers who wrote Casablanca are related to the general manager of the Red Sox.
The director of  Casablanca also directed Field of Dreams with Kevin Costner.
David Papi Ortiz, the Red Sox slugger, who grew up in the Dominican Republic, learned to speak English by watching the movie on tape.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The brothers who wrote Casablanca are related to the general manager of the Red Sox.

questions.question: What crossed paths connect Uma Thurman with psychologist Timothy Leary, the notorious Pied Piper of LSD, who died in 1996?

options.text: Timothy Leary was the godfather of Uma Thurman and Winona Ryder.
Leary was once married to Umas mother.
Leary and Umas father, a Buddhist-scholar, shared the same mantra.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leary was once married to Umas mother.

questions.question: Singer Etta James is not a billiards player, but she is very aware of the exploits of legendary pool shark Minnesota Fats. Why?

options.text: Her father lost the family home in a gambling debt to Minnesota Fats.
As a child, she appeared as an extra in the pool movie The Hustler.
She believes that Fats was her father.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She believes that Fats was her father.

questions.question: What was special about the town of Columbia, MD where actor Edward Norton Jr. grew up?

options.text: It was created by his maternal grandfather, urban planner James Rouse.
It was created by Edmund Bacon, the father of his friend Kevin Bacon.
It was famous for its nude theater company.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It was created by his maternal grandfather, urban planner James Rouse.

questions.question: Which character from the sci fi movie Pitch Black was portrayed by Vin Diesel?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard B. Riddick

questions.question: Why does U.S. Congressman Rahm Emanuel (D-Illinois) have a keen interest in one major character on the HBO series Entourage?

options.text: He worked his way through law school as a parking valet  for Hollywood celebs.
His brother, Hollywood agent Ariel Emanuel, is the model for the agent character  Arie.
His mother runs the shows craft services table.
His actress daughter plays character Vinnie Chases press agent.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His brother, Hollywood agent Ariel Emanuel, is the model for the agent character  Arie.

questions.question: What does President George W. Bush have in common with the 16th-century religious dissenter Anne Marbury Hutchinson?

options.text: Both are distant relatives of the Kennedys
Both are distant relatives of the Nixons.
Both are descended from an Irish warlord named Strongbow.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Both are descended from an Irish warlord named Strongbow.

Theyve all served as judges in the Miss America Pageant.
